pageContext.name: May: Awarded Web Contractor for CWP Tender

sections.label: May: Awarded Web Contractor for CWP Tender
sections.description:
CommonTown is pleased to announce that we have been awarded the Info-communications Media Development Authority (IMDA; formerly known as IDA) (T)1374 Content Websites Platform (CWP) tender to be a web contractor.  

Our Swiiit is appointed as the selected content management system (CMS) for this tender. It will be provided to Singapore government agencies.

Swiiit is widely used by schools under the Ministry of Education in Singapore. 

About Swiiit
Swiiit is a Web Content Management System (CMS) that allows anyone without HTML knowledge to edit webpages at ease.

Features: 
  • Point-and-type to edit text instantly
  • Drag-and-drop to add or replace images
  • Assign webpage editors 
  • Mobile-optimised design templates, web apps and widgets available
  • Create instant microsites easily
  • Search engine friendly

Go Fast, Simple and Smart with Swiiit today!

To find out more about our Content Websites Platform (CWP) program for Singapore government agencies, please click here.

For more information on our Swiiit, please visit www.swiiit.com.
